attributes.action: Extend the no smoking area out to a 10 metre radius of all entrances/exits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Extend the no smoking area out to a 10 metre radius of all entrances/exits and to define a walled corridor leading to such entrances/exits as being part of the 'enclosed public place'. This will have the additional (and probably originally intended) benefit of allowing access to building without having to negotiate the (post smoking ban) concentrated gatherings of smokers around such entrances/exits.
